title: The Druids (History Celts).pdf
description:
Pdf / English / 1994 / 304 pages / 54 MB

In this compelling and highly readable study of the Druids, respected Celtic scholar Peter Berresford Ellis sifts through the historical evidence, the legend and lore, and gives the first authentic, reliable account of who the mysterious Druids were and what role they played in Celtic society. Including fourteen black-and-white photographs of Celtic relics and related material, this book offers a fascinating entree into an ancient people who continue to invoke fascination to this day
